0.Text:
Sprout an additional limb, dealing {1} Shadow damage over {2} sec to all nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond {3} targets. Every {4} sec, an enemy is pulled to your location if they are further than {5} yds from you. The same enemy can only be pulled once every {6} sec.

Gain Runic Corruption instantly, and again every {7} sec.

Gain {7} Bone Shield charges instantly, and again every {8} sec.

2.Text:
Sprout an additional limb, dealing {1} Shadow damage over {2} sec to all nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond {3} targets. Every {4} sec, an enemy is pulled to your location if they are further than {5} yds from you. The same enemy can only be pulled once every {6} sec.

0.Text: Frostwyrm's Fury has {1}% reduced cooldown and Freezes all enemies hit for {2} sec.
Icebound Fortitude's cooldown is reduced by {1} sec.
Your Raise Dead spell summons an additional skeletal minion.
Reduces the cooldown of Anti-Magic Shell by {1} sec and increases its duration and amount absorbed by {2}%.
Surrounds you in an Anti-Magic Shell for {1} sec, absorbing up to {2} magic damage and preventing application of harmful magical effects. Damage absorbed generates Runic Power.
Places an Anti-Magic Zone that reduces spell damage taken by party or raid members by {1}%. The Anti-Magic Zone lasts for {2} sec or until it absorbs {3} damage.
Apocalypse's cooldown is reduced by {1} sec. Additionally, Death Coil and Epidemic reduce the cooldown of Army of the Dead by {2} sec.
Summons a legion of ghouls who swarms your enemies, fighting anything they can for {1} sec.
Lifts the enemy target off the ground, crushing their throat with dark energy and stunning them for {1} sec.
The amount absorbed by Anti-Magic Zone is increased by {1}% and grants up to {2} Runic Power based on the amount absorbed.
Casting Howling Blast with Rime active causes jagged icicles to fall on enemies nearby your target, applying Razorice and dealing {1} Frost damage.
Remorseless Winter damage is increased by {1}%. The first time Remorseless Winter deals damage to {2} different enemies, you gain Rime.
Chains of Ice reduces the target's Haste by {1}%. Frost Strike refreshes the duration of Chains of Ice.

Targets in a cone in front of you are blinded, causing them to wander disoriented for {1} sec. Damage may cancel the effect.

When Blinding Sleet ends, enemies are slowed by {2}% for {3} sec.
When you fall below {1}% health you drain {2} health from nearby enemies. Can only occur every {3} min.
Anti-Magic Shell heals you for {1}% of the damage it absorbs.
Heart Strike deals {1}% increased damage, but also costs {2}% of your max health.
Stamina increased by {1}%.
Increases Leech by {1}%.

Consume the essence around you to generate {1} Rune.

Recharge time reduced by {2} sec whenever a Bone Shield charge is consumed.

Drains {1} health from the target over {2} sec.

You can move, parry, dodge, and use defensive abilities while channeling this ability.
While Blood Shield is active, you deal {1}% increased Physical damage.

Your auto attacks have a chance to summon a Bloodworm.

Bloodworms deal minor damage to your target for {1} sec and then burst, healing you for {2}% of your missing health.

If you drop below {3}% health, your Bloodworms will immediately burst and heal you.

Consuming Killing Machine grants {1}% critical strike chance for {2} sec, stacking up to {3} times. At {4} stacks your next Killing Machine consumes the stacks and grants you {5}% increased Frost damage for {6} sec.

A whirl of bone and gore batters all nearby enemies, dealing {1} Shadow damage every {2} sec, and healing you for {3}% of your maximum health every time it deals damage (up to {4}%). Lasts {5} sec per {6} Runic Power spent. Deals reduced damage beyond {7} targets.

Continuously deal {1} Frost damage every {2} sec to enemies in a cone in front of you, until your Runic Power is exhausted. Deals reduced damage to secondary targets.

{FFFFFFFF|Generates {3} Runes at the start and end.}
Your diseases have a chance to weaken your enemy causing your attacks against them to deal {1}% increased damage for {2} sec.
Bursting a Festering Wound deals {1}% more damage, and deals {2} Shadow damage to all nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond {3} targets.
Shackles the target with frozen chains, reducing movement speed by {1}% for {2} sec.

Deals {1} Frost damage to the target and reduces their movement speed by {2}% for {3} sec.

Chill Streak bounces up to {4} times between closest targets within {5} yards.
Deals {1} Shadow damage and causes {2} Festering Wound to burst.
Obliterate hits up to {1} additional enemy while you remain in Death and Decay.

1.Text: Heart Strike hits up to {1} additional enemies while you remain in Death and Decay.

2.Text: Scourge Strike hits up to {1} additional enemies while you remain in Death and Decay.

0.Text: Death Grip slows enemy movement speed by {1}% for {2} sec.
Enemies affected by Blood Plague take {1}% increased damage from you and Death Strike increases the damage of your Blood Plague by {2}% for {3} sec, stacking up to {4} times.
Death Coil causes the target to take an additional {1}% of the direct damage dealt over {2} sec.
Every {1} sec, gain a stack of Cold Heart, causing your next Chains of Ice to deal {2} Frost damage. Stacks up to {3} times.
Frost Strike has a {1}% chance on critical strikes to grant Killing Machine.
Successfully interrupting an enemy with Mind Freeze grants {1} Runic Power and reduces its cooldown by {2} sec.
Dark Transformation also empowers your Gargoyle and Army of the Dead for {1} sec, increasing their damage by {2}%.
Strikes all enemies in front of you with a hungering attack that deals {1} Physical damage and heals you for {2}% of that damage. Deals reduced damage beyond {3} targets.
Dominates the target undead creature up to level {1}, forcing it to do your bidding for {2} min.
Your auto attacks on targets infected with your Blood Plague have a chance to make your next Death and Decay cost no runes and reset its cooldown.

Summons a rune weapon for {1} sec that mirrors your melee attacks and bolsters your defenses.

While active, you gain {2}% parry chance.
Command the target to attack you.
Places a dark ward on an enemy player that persists for {1} sec, triggering when the enemy next spends mana on a spell, and allowing the Death Knight to unleash an exact duplicate of that spell.
When you kill an enemy that yields experience or honor, your next Death Strike within {1} sec is free and heals for an additional {2}% of maximum health.

Your ghoul deals {1} Shadow damage to {2} nearby enemies and transforms into a powerful undead monstrosity for {3} sec. Granting them {4}% energy and the ghoul's abilities are empowered and take on new functions while the transformation is active.

After your Remorseless Winter deals damage {1} times to a target, they are stunned for {2} sec.

Remorseless Winter's cooldown is increased by {3} sec.

Corrupts the targeted ground, causing {1} Shadow damage over {2} sec to targets within the area.

While you remain within the area, your Obliterate will hit up to {3} additional target.

Corrupts the targeted ground, causing {1} Shadow damage over {2} sec to targets within the area.

While you remain within the area, your  Heart Strike will hit up to {3} additional targets.

While you remain within the area, your  Scourge Strike will hit up to {3} enemies near the target.

0.Text: Chains {1} enemies together, dealing {2} Shadow damage and causing {3}% of all damage taken to also be received by the others in the chain. Lasts for {4} sec.

Fires a blast of unholy energy at the target and {1} additional nearby target, causing {2} Shadow damage to an enemy or healing an Undead ally for {3} health.

Increases the duration of Dark Transformation by {4} sec.

1.Text: Fires a blast of unholy energy at the target, causing {1} Shadow damage to an enemy or healing an Undead ally for {2} health.

0.Text:
Opens a gate which you can use to return to Ebon Hold.

Using a Death Gate while in Ebon Hold will return you back to near your departure point.
Harnesses the energy that surrounds and binds all matter, drawing the target toward you and forcing the enemy to attack you.

1.Text: Harnesses the energy that surrounds and binds all matter, drawing the target toward you.

0.Text: Create a death pact that heals you for {1}% of your maximum health, but absorbs incoming healing equal to {2}% of your max health for {3} sec.

Death Coil and Epidemic debilitate your enemy applying Death Rot causing them to take {1}% increased Shadow damage, up to {2}% from you for {3} sec. If Death Coil or Epidemic consume Sudden Doom it applies two stacks of Death Rot.
Focuses dark power into a strike with both weapons, that deals a total of {1} Physical damage and heals you for {2}% of all damage taken in the last {3} sec, minimum {4}% of maximum health.

1.Text: Focuses dark power into a strike that deals {1} Physical damage and heals you for {2}% of all damage taken in the last {3} sec, minimum {4}% of maximum health.

0.Text:
For {1} sec, your movement speed is increased by {2}%, you cannot be slowed below {3}% of normal speed, and you are immune to forced movement effects and knockbacks.

{FFFFFFFF|Passive:} You cannot be slowed below {4}% of normal speed.
Death's Advance, Death and Decay, and Death Grip have {1} additional charge.

Increases the range of Death Grip by {1} yds.

Killing an enemy that yields experience or honor resets the cooldown of Death Grip.
All enemies within {1} yards slowly decay, losing up to {2}% of their max health every {3} sec. Max {4} stacks. Lasts {5} sec.

Defile the targeted ground, dealing {1} Shadow damage to all enemies over {2} sec.

While you remain within your Defile, your Scourge Strike will hit {3} enemies near the target.

Every sec, if any enemies are standing in the Defile, it grows in size, dealing increased damage, and increasing your Mastery by {4}%, up to {5}%.
Howling Blast applies Delirium, reducing the cooldown recovery rate of movement enhancing abilities by {1}% for {2} sec.
Sudden Doom also causes your next Death Coil to burst up to {1} Festering Wounds and reduce the target's movement speed by {2}% per burst. Lasts {3} sec.
Virulent Plague deals {1}% more damage over time in half the duration.

Empower your rune weapon, gaining {1}% Haste and generating {2} Rune and {3} Runic Power instantly and every {4} sec for {5} sec.

If you already know {ffffffff|Empower Rune Weapon}, instead gain {6} additional charge of {ffffffff|Empower Rune Weapon}.

1.Text: Empower your rune weapon, gaining {1}% Haste and generating {2} Rune and {3} Runic Power instantly and every {4} sec for {5} sec.

0.Text: Chill Streak's bounce range is increased by {1} yds and each time Chill Streak bounces it has a {2}% chance to increase the maximum number of bounces by {3}.
When Pillar of Frost expires, your Strength is increased by {1}% for {2} sec. This effect lasts {3} sec longer for each Obliterate and Frostscythe critical strike during Pillar of Frost.
Your ghoul's attacks have a chance to apply Enfeeble, reducing the enemies movement speed by {1}% and the damage they deal to you by {2}% for {3} sec.

Causes each of your Virulent Plagues to flare up, dealing {1} Shadow damage to the infected enemy, and an additional {2} Shadow damage to all other enemies near them.

Increases the duration of Dark Transformation by {3} sec.
Death Coil and Epidemic increase the duration of Dark Transformation by {1} sec.
Remorseless Winter deals {1}% increased damage to enemies it hits, stacking up to {2} times.
Summons {1} additional copy of Dancing Rune Weapon and increases its duration by {2} sec.
Killing Machine can stack up to {1} additional time.
Festering Strike has a {1}% chance to generate {2} Rune and grant Runic Corruption.
Popping a Festering Wound increases your Strength by {1}% for {2} sec stacking. Does not refresh duration.
Each charge of Bone Shield increases your maximum health by {1}%.
Obliterate deals {1}% increased damage and has a {2}% chance to refund {3} runes.
Chill your weapon with icy power and quickly strike the enemy, dealing {1} Frost damage.

A sweeping attack that strikes all enemies in front of you for {1} Frost damage. This attack benefits from Killing Machine. Critical strikes with Frostscythe deal {2} times normal damage. Deals reduced damage beyond {3} targets.

Pillar of Frost summons a Frostwhelp who breathes on all enemies within {1} yards in front of you for {2} Frost damage. Each unique enemy hit by Frostwhelp's Aid grants you {3}% Mastery for {4} sec, up to {5}%.
Summons a frostwyrm who breathes on all enemies within {1} yd in front of you, dealing {2} Frost damage and slowing movement speed by {3}% for {4} sec.
Each Rune spent during Remorseless Winter increases its damage by {1}%, and extends its duration by {2} sec.
Dark Transformation also increases the attack speed and damage of you and your Monstrosity by {1}%.
Summon glacial spikes from the ground that advance forward, each dealing {1} Frost damage and applying Razorice to enemies near their eruption point.
Absorbs are {1}% more effective on you.
Shadowy tendrils coil around all enemies within {1} yards of a hostile or friendly target, pulling them to the target's location.
Death and Decay reduces the movement speed of enemies within its area by {1}%, decaying by {2}% every sec.
Sudden Doom triggers {1}% more often, can accumulate up to {2} charges, and increases the damage of your next Death Coil by {3}% or Epidemic by {4}%.
Instantly strike the target and {1} other nearby enemy, causing {2} Physical damage, and reducing enemies' movement speed by {3}% for {4} sec, plus {5} Runic Power per additional enemy struck.|r

Heart Strike has a chance to increase the damage of your next Death Strike by {1}%.
Each enemy hit by Blood Boil increases the damage and healing done by your next Death Strike by {1}%, stacking up to {2} times.
Blow the Horn of Winter, gaining {1} Runes and generating {2} Runic Power.
Your blood freezes, granting immunity to Stun effects and reducing all damage you take by {1}% for {2} sec.
When empowered by Rime, Howling Blast deals {1}% increased damage to your primary target.
Your Frost Strike and Obliterate critical strikes reduce the remaining cooldown of Pillar of Frost by {1} sec.
Your Runic Power spending abilities increase your melee attack speed by {1}% for {2} sec, stacking up to {3} times.
Bone Shield increases your Haste by {1}%.
Death Coil deals {1}% additional damage and seeks out {2} additional nearby enemy.
Death Strike's cost is reduced by {1}, and its healing is increased by {2}%.
Festering Strike and Festering Wound damage increased by {1}%.

Increases Howling Blast damage done by an additional {1}%.

Gain Inexorable Assault every {1} sec, stacking up to {2} times.

Obliterate consumes a stack to deal an additional {3} Frost damage.
Your ghoul's Claw attack has a {1}% chance to cause a Festering Wound on the target.
Dancing Rune Weapon generates {1} Bone Shield charges. When a charge of Bone Shield is consumed, the cooldown of Dancing Rune Weapon is reduced by {2} sec.
Your auto-attacks reduce the target's auto-attack speed by {1}% for {2} sec, stacking up to {3} times.
Frost Fever critical strikes increase the chance to grant Runic Power by an additional {1}%.
Blood Shield's duration is increased by {1} sec and it absorbs {2}% more damage.
Your auto attack critical strikes have a chance to make your next Obliterate deal Frost damage and critically strike.
Reduces the cooldown of Dancing Rune Weapon by {1}% and its duration by {2}%.
Heart Strike heals you for {1}% health for each enemy hit while affected by Blood Plague.
Draw upon unholy energy to become Undead for {1} sec, increasing Leech by {2}%, reducing damage taken by {3}%, and making you immune to Charm, Fear, and Sleep.

When targets afflicted by your Virulent Plague are healed, you are also healed for {1}% of the amount. 

In addition, your Virulent Plague now erupts for {2}% of normal eruption damage when dispelled.
Apocalypse and Army of the Dead also summon a Magus of the Dead who hurls Frostbolts and Shadow Bolts at your foes.
Death's Advance grants an additional {1}% movement speed over the first {2} sec.
Places a Mark of Blood on an enemy for {1} sec. The enemy's damaging auto attacks will also heal their victim for {2}% of the victim's maximum health.

Each time you heal yourself with Death Strike, you gain {1}% of the amount healed as a Physical damage absorption shield.

Also increases your attack power by {2}%.
Increases the damage of your Minions and Shadow damage abilities by {1}%.
Increases the damage of your Frost abilities by {1}%.
Increases Critical Strike chance by {1}%.
Increases Strength by {1}%.
Wielding a two-handed weapon increases Obliterate damage by {1}%, and your auto attack critical strikes always grant Killing Machine.
Smash the target's mind with cold, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for {1} sec.
Diseased enemies take {1}% increased damage from you per disease they are affected by.
Consuming the Killing Machine effect has a {1}% chance to grant you {2} Rune.

You focus the assault on this target, increasing their damage taken by {1}% for {2} sec.  Each unique player that attacks the target increases the damage taken by an additional {3}%, stacking up to {4} times.

Your melee attacks refresh the duration of Focused Assault.
All enemies within {1} yards take {2}% increased magical damage.

Bursting a Festering Wound converts it into a Necrotic Wound, absorbing {1}% of all healing received for {2} sec and healing you for the amount absorbed when the effect ends, up to {3}% of your max health.

Max {4} stacks. Adding a stack does not refresh the duration.
A brutal attack that deals {1} Physical damage.
While Pillar of Frost is active, Frost Strike and Howling Blast always grant Killing Machine and have a {1}% chance to generate a Rune.
You are as hard to stop as death itself, increasing your mounted speed by {1}%.

While you have at least {1} Bone Shield charges, the cost of Death Strike is reduced by {2} Runic Power.

Additionally, your maximum Runic Power is increased by {3}.

Activates a freezing aura for {1} min that creates ice beneath your feet, allowing party or raid members within {2} yards to walk on water.

Usable while mounted, but being attacked or damaged will cancel the effect.
Your auto attack damage grants you an absorb shield equal to {1}% of the damage dealt.
When Crimson Scourge is consumed, you gain {1}% Versatility for {2} sec.
Death and Decay damage has a {1}% chance to apply a Festering Wound to the enemy.
Enemies suffer {1}% increased damage from Chill Streak each time they are struck by it.

The power of frost increases your Strength by {1}% for {2} sec.

Each Rune spent while active increases your Strength by an additional {3}%.
Scourge Strike causes your disease damage to occur {1}% more quickly for {2} sec.
Chains of Ice affects {1} additional nearby enemy.

An unholy pact that prevents fatal damage, instead absorbing incoming healing equal to the damage prevented, lasting {1} sec.

If any healing absorption remains when this effect expires, you will die. This effect may only occur every {2} min.
Obliterate has a {1}% increased chance to trigger Rime and Howling Blast generates {2} Runic Power while Rime is active.
Raises an Abomination for {1} sec which wanders and attacks enemies near where it was summoned, applying Festering Wound when it melees targets, and affecting all those nearby with Virulent Plague.
Pours dark energy into a dead target, reuniting spirit and body to allow the target to reenter battle with {1}% health and at least {2}% mana.
Raises a ghoul to fight by your side. You can have a maximum of one ghoul at a time.

Your Blood Plague and Death and Decay deal damage {1}% more often.

Reanimates a nearby corpse, summoning a zombie with {1} health for {2} sec to slowly move towards your target. 

If it reaches your target, it explodes stunning all enemies within {3} yards for {4} sec and dealing {5}% of enemies health in Shadow damage.
Your Soul Reaper, Scourge Strike, Festering Strike, and Death Coil deal {1}% addtional damage to enemies below {2}% health.
Reduces the cooldown on Vampiric Blood by {1} sec per {2} Runic Power spent.
Increases Armor gained from Bone Shield by {1}%.
While Crimson Scourge is active, your next Death and Decay heals you for {1} health per Bone Shield charge and you immediately gain {2} Runic Power.
Drain the warmth of life from all nearby enemies within {1} yards, dealing {2} Frost damage over {3} sec and reducing their movement speed by {4}%.
When a Festering Wound pops it generates an additional {1} Runic Power.
Obliterate has a {1}% chance to cause your next Howling Blast to consume no runes and deal {2}% additional damage.
Your Death and Decay rots enemies each time it deals damage, absorbing healing equal to {1}% of damage dealt.
Sudden Doom causes your next Death Coil to also increase your Scourge Strike damage against the target by {1}% for {2} sec.

Reduces all damage taken by {1}% for {2} sec.
Allows the Death Knight to emblazon their weapon with runes.

Increases your maximum Runic Power by {1}.
Each Runic Power you spend has a {1}% chance to increase your Rune regeneration rate by {2}% for {3} sec.
Each Runic Power you spend has a {1}% chance to instantly grant you a Rune.
Increases your maximum Runic Power by {1} and increases the Rune regeneration rate of Runic Corruption by {2}%.
When your ghouls expire, they explode in viscera dealing {1} Shadow damage to nearby enemies. Each explosion has a {2}% chance to apply Festering Wounds to enemies hit.
Sacrifice your ghoul to deal {1} Shadow damage to all nearby enemies and heal for {2}% of your maximum health. Deals reduced damage beyond {3} targets.
You deal {1}% more damage and receive {2}% more healing while standing in your Death and Decay.
An unholy strike that deals {1} Physical damage and {2} Shadow damage, and causes {3} Festering Wound to burst.
When Frost Strike damages an enemy with {1} stacks of Razorice it will consume them to deal an additional {2}% damage.
When Bone Shield is consumed it shatters dealing {1} shadow damage to nearby enemies. This damage is tripled while you are within your Death and Decay.
Enemies within {1} yards of you become shrouded in winter, reducing the range of their spells and abilities by {2}%.

Strike an enemy for {1} Shadowfrost damage and afflict the enemy with Soul Reaper. 

After {2} sec, if the target is below {3}% health this effect will explode dealing an additional {4} Shadowfrost damage to the target. If the enemy that yields experience or honor dies while afflicted by Soul Reaper, gain Runic Corruption.
Rune of Spellwarding is applied to you with {1}% increased effect.
Shadowy tendrils constrict an enemy's throat, silencing them for {1} sec.
Your auto attacks have a chance to make your next Death Coil or Epidemic cost no Runic Power.
Your Virulent Plague also applies Frost Fever and Blood Plague at {1}% effectiveness.
Damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by {1}%.

Consume up to {1} Bone Shield charges. For each charge consumed, you gain {2} Runic Power and absorb damage equal to {3}% of your maximum health for {4} sec.
After Vampiric Blood expires, you absorb damage equal to {1} times the damage your Blood Plague dealt during Vampiric Blood.
Strike your target dealing {1} Shadow damage, infecting the target with {2} Festering Wounds and sending you into an Unholy Frenzy increasing haste by {3}% for {4} sec.
All enemies within {1} yards take {2}% increased damage from your minions.

Surrounds yourself with a vile swarm of insects for {1} sec, stinging all nearby enemies and infecting them with Virulent Plague and an unholy disease that deals {2} damage over {3} sec, stacking up to {4} times.
Increases the effectiveness of your Runeforge effects by {1}%.
The cooldown of Dark Transformation is reduced by {1} sec.
Increases Lichborne duration by {1} sec and while active damage taken is reduced by {2}%.
Gain {1}% Haste while you remain within your Death and Decay.

Damaging an enemy with a Runic Power ability increases your Strength by {1}% for {2} sec, stacks up to {3} times.
Embrace your undeath, increasing your maximum health by {1}% and increasing all healing and absorbs received by {2}% for {3} sec.
Stamina increased by {1}%.
Inflict disease upon your enemies spreading Festering Wounds equal to the amount currently active on your target to {1} nearby enemies.
Death Strike's healing is increased by {1}% and grants you {2}% Leech for {3} sec.
Your Death Grip causes the target to be unable to move faster than normal movement speed for {1} sec.
Damage taken below {1}% Health is reduced by {2}%.

Embrace the power of the Shadowlands, removing all root effects and increasing your movement speed by {1}% for {2} sec. Taking any action cancels the effect.
